item.title: 需求出现改善迹象，石油将迎来周涨幅
item.description: 周五亚洲交易时段油价上涨，全球基准布伦特油价将在三周内首次上涨，原因是有迹象表明全球需求在改善，而且头号石油消费国美国的通胀在放缓。【原文：Oil prices rose in Asian trading hours on Friday, with global benchmark Brent set for its first weekly increase in three weeks on signs of improving global demand and slowing inflation in top oil consumer the United States.】

item.title: 文件称谷歌寻求在美国广告技术诉讼案中进行非陪审团审判
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周四向法院提交了一份文件，要求对美国司法部指控这家广告和搜索巨头在网络广告市场中的反竞争行为的诉讼进行非陪审团审判。【原文：Alphabet's Google in a court filing on Thursday is seeking a non-jury trial in the U.S. Justice Department's lawsuit accusing the advertising and search giant of anticompetitive practices in the online advertising marketplace.】

item.title: 拜登签署全面航空安全和改革法案，使其成为法律
item.description: 乔-拜登总统周四签署了全面的航空立法，以增加美国空中交通管制员的人手，增加资金以避免跑道关闭事件，并加快取消航班的退款速度。【原文：President Joe Biden on Thursday signed sweeping aviation legislation to boost U.S. air traffic controller staffing, increase funding to avert runway close-call incidents and speed refunds for canceled flights.】

item.title: 工会为波音公司代表提供有关美国举报人法律的培训
item.description: 波音公司的一个工程工会周四表示，将首次为其代表提供有关美国举报人法律的培训，因为该工会担心其成员缺乏足够的保护，可能遭到报复。【原文：A Boeing engineering union said on Thursday it will offer its representatives training on U.S. whistleblower laws for the first time, following concerns that its members lack adequate protection against possible reprisals.】

item.title: 海底捞餐饮运营商 Super Hi 在美国的首次公开募股定价为每股 19.56 美元
item.description: 在海外市场经营中国连锁火锅店 "海底捞 "的 Super Hi International 周四将其在美国的首次公开募股定价为每股 19.56 美元。【原文：Super Hi International , which operates Chinese hotpot restaurant chain Haidilao in the overseas market, on Thursday priced its initial public offering in the United States at $19.56 per share.】

item.title: 早间竞价中国数据公布前市场情绪高涨
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 纽约市广播公司首席运营官卸任
item.description: 陷入困境的贷款机构纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）周四表示，其首席运营官 Julie-Ann Signorille-Browne 已辞职，自 5 月 24 日起生效。【原文：Embattled lender New York Community Bancorp said on Thursday that its Chief Operating Officer Julie-Ann Signorille-Browne has resigned from her role, effective May 24.】

item.title: OpenAI 达成协议，将 Reddit 内容引入 ChatGPT
item.description: Reddit 与 OpenAI 周四表示，双方已合作将该社交媒体平台的内容引入流行的聊天机器人 ChatGPT，这使得 Reddit 的股价在盘中上涨了 12%。【原文：Reddit has partnered with OpenAI to bring the social media platform's content to popular chatbot ChatGPT, the companies said on Thursday, sending Reddit's shares up 12% in extended trade.】

item.title: 备忘录称，福特要求供应商削减成本，以推动电动汽车业务实现盈利
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份公司备忘录，福特汽车公司已要求其电动汽车供应商降低成本，以支持盈利能力，并称 "一切都摆在桌面上"。【原文：Ford Motor Co has asked its electric-vehicle suppliers to reduce costs in an attempt to support profitability, saying "everything is on the table," according to a company memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 纽约诉讼称人工智能配音公司盗用演员声音
item.description: 两名配音演员周四在曼哈顿联邦法院起诉人工智能初创公司 Lovo，指控该公司非法复制他们的声音，并未经许可将其用于人工智能配音技术。【原文：Two voice actors sued artificial-intelligence startup Lovo in Manhattan federal court on Thursday, accusing the company of illegally copying their voices and using them without permission in its AI voiceover technology.】

item.title: 司法部提议对大麻重新分类后，大麻股反弹
item.description: 在美国司法部公布放宽大麻限制的历史性提案后，包括 Tilray 、Curaleaf 和 AdvisorShares Pure US Cannabis ETF 在内的大麻股票周四大涨。【原文：Cannabis stocks including Tilray , Curaleaf , and the AdvisorShares Pure US Cannabis ETF rallied on Thursday after the U.S. Department of Justice unveiled a historic proposal to ease restrictions on marijuana.】

item.title: 道指突破 40,000 点，拜登在分屏视频中嘲讽特朗普
item.description: 周四，道琼斯指数首次突破 40,000 点，创下历史新高，这为美国总统乔-拜登提供了一个机会，证明他的共和党竞选对手对 2020 年的预测是错误的。【原文：The Dow topped 40,000 for the first time on Thursday in an all-time high, giving U.S. President Joe Biden an opening to prove his Republican election rival's 2020 predictions wrong.】

item.title: 摩根大通投资者在创纪录的一年后权衡首席执行官戴蒙的战略和继任问题
item.description: 摩根大通今年的利润创下历史新高，投资者迫切希望了解该公司的继任计划、人工智能投资以及传统银行业务以外的机遇。【原文：With JPMorgan Chase coming off a year of record profits, investors are eager to learn about the firm's succession plans, investments in artificial intelligence and opportunities beyond traditional banking.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪推迟 2025 年智利锂电正极工厂计划
item.description: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪公司美洲区负责人周二告诉路透社，该公司已推迟到2025年在智利生产电动汽车（EV）电池用锂电正极的计划。【原文：Chinese carmaker BYD Co has postponed plans to produce lithium cathodes for electric vehicle (EV) batteries in Chile by 2025, the firm's Americas head told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛的强劲预测预示着消费者将保持活力
item.description: 周四，零售业的风向标沃尔玛发布了一份积极的预测，表明美国消费者的购买力正在恢复，这与沃尔玛的一家主要供应商和一家零售业竞争对手早些时候的言论一致。【原文：A positive forecast from retail bellwether Walmart on Thursday signaled a resilient U.S. shopper, in line with earlier remarks by one of its key suppliers and one of its retail rivals.】

item.title: 波音供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 发言人称将裁员
item.description: 据媒体周四援引内部文件报道，精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）正在美国堪萨斯州威奇托市裁员数百人，原因是该公司正面临高额债务和主要客户波音公司生产放缓的问题。【原文：Spirit AeroSystems is laying off several hundred members of its workforce in Wichita, Kan., according to a media report Thursday citing internal documents, as the company deals with high debt and slowed production at Boeing, its key customer.】

item.title: 特斯拉德国工厂扩建获当地议会批准
item.description: 尽管美国电动汽车制造商特斯拉的扩建计划遭到抗议，但特斯拉位于柏林附近的格鲁海德（Gruenheide）的德国工厂仍于周四获得了当地议会的批准。【原文：Tesla got the go-ahead for an expansion of its German factory in Gruenheide near Berlin from the local council on Thursday despite protests against the U.S. electric vehicle maker's plans.】

item.title: 巴西政府上调 2024 年国内生产总值预测，预计通胀率将上升
item.description: 巴西财政部周四上调了对该国今年经济增长的预期，但同时也上调了对2024年和2025年通货膨胀的预期，强调了近期南里奥格兰德州洪灾对物价造成的影响。【原文：Brazil's Finance Ministry on Thursday hiked its projection for the country's economic growth this year but also raised inflation estimates for 2024 and 2025, underlining price impacts from recent floods in Rio Grande do Sul state.】

item.title: 美国农业投入销售情况良好，南美则不尽如人意
item.description: 据农业投入品生产商称，尽管谷物价格下降，但化肥和作物护理产品等农业投入品在美国的销售已接近正常水平，而在南美，销售情况却不尽如人意。【原文：Sales of agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and crop care products have been near normal in the United States despite lower grain prices, while they are not as good in South America, according to agricultural input producers.】

item.title: 数据改善，美联储仍对减产持谨慎态度
item.description: 本周的数据为美国联邦储备委员会提供了两方面的好消息，但政策制定者尚未就投资者确信将于今年开始的降息时机公开转变观点。【原文：Data this week offered the U.S. Federal Reserve good news on two fronts but policymakers haven't openly shifted views yet about the timing of rate cuts investors are convinced will start this year.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会更新华尔街客户数据黑客规则
item.description: 华尔街最高监管机构周四表示，它已更新了相关规则，以确保投资公司和其他机构努力检测和应对黑客窃取客户数据的行为。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator on Thursday said it had updated rules to ensure investment companies and others work to detect and respond to hackers' theft of customer data.】

item.title: 英美资源集团首席执行官表示，英美资源集团数月来一直在寻找化肥合作伙伴
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American）首席执行官邓肯-万布拉德（Duncan Wanblad）告诉路透社记者，英美资源集团为其在北约克郡的化肥厂项目寻找合作伙伴已经有大约六个月的时间，他重申，即使那里的工作停滞不前，化肥厂业务仍将是这家改组矿商的三大支柱之一。【原文：Anglo American has been looking for partners for its fertiliser project in North Yorkshire for around six months, Chief Executive Duncan Wanblad told Reuters, reiterating the business will be one of three pillars of the revamped miner, even as work there stalls.】

item.title: 美联储梅斯特寻求通胀压力缓解的更多证据
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长洛雷塔-梅斯特（Loretta Mester）周四表示，将美国央行政策维持在当前水平将有助于使仍然高企的通胀率回到2%的目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Loretta Mester said on Thursday holding U.S. central bank policy at current levels will help get still-high inflation back to the 2% target.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空公司扩大巴西国际航班的频率；法国航空公司增加航线
item.description: 拉塔姆航空公司（LATAM Airlines）周四表示，该公司将增加连接巴西与美国以及欧洲和非洲国家的七条国际航线的班次。【原文：LATAM Airlines will increase the frequency of seven of its international routes connecting Brazil to the United States and countries in Europe and Africa, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 白宫布雷纳德称中国出口可能损害对美投资
item.description: 白宫国家经济顾问莱尔-布雷纳德（Lael Brainard）周四表示，中国的工业产能和某些行业的出口量如此之大，可能会削弱在美国投资的可行性。【原文：White House National Economic Adviser Lael Brainard said on Thursday China's industrial capacity and exports in certain sectors are so large, they can undermine the viability of investments in the United States.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织美国应保持开放贸易，与中国合作解决争端
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周四表示，美国最好维持其开放的贸易体系，而不是对中国商品征收新的惩罚性关税。【原文：The U.S. would be better served by maintaining its open trade system rather than imposing new punitive duties on Chinese goods, the International Monetary Fund said on Thursday, adding that Washington and Beijing should work together to resolve their trade tensions.】

item.title: 迪士尼、福克斯、华纳兄弟发现名为 Venu Sports 的体育流媒体合资企业
item.description: 该公司首席执行官皮特-迪斯塔德（Pete Distad）周四表示，华特迪士尼公司、华纳兄弟发现公司和福克斯公司将推出的体育流媒体服务将被命名为 Venu Sports，并有望于今年秋季推出。【原文：The sports-streaming service set to be launched by Walt Disney Co , Warner Bros Discovery and Fox Corp will be called Venu Sports and is on track for launch this fall, Pete Distad, the venture's CEO, said on Thursday.】

item.title: 安培计算公司与高通公司合作研发人工智能，并发布新芯片
item.description: 安培计算公司（Ampere Computing）周四表示，该公司正在将其芯片与高通公司（Qualcomm）的芯片进行配对，推出一款新产品，旨在降低人工智能芯片运行所产生的电费。【原文：Ampere Computing on Thursday said it was pairing its chips with those from Qualcomm in a new offering aimed at lowering the power bills from operating artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: VIEW 道指触及 40,000 点，因盈利增长和降息押注
item.description: 周四，道琼斯工业平均指数首次突破 40,000 点，这是蓝筹股指数最快的一次 10,000 点攀升，强劲的季度业绩和对美联储降息的押注不断升温为其提供了动力。【原文：The Dow Jones Industrial Average surpassed 40,000 points for the first time on Thursday, the blue-chip index's fastest 10,000 point-climb, powered by strong quarterly results and rising bets of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 受财报提振和降息押注影响，道指短暂冲破 40,000 点大关
item.description: 周四，道琼斯工业平均指数首次短暂突破 40,000 点水平，这是蓝筹股指数最快的一次 10,000 点攀升，强劲的季度业绩和对美联储降息的押注不断升温为其提供了动力。【原文：The Dow Jones Industrial Average briefly breached the 40,000-point level for the first time on Thursday, the blue-chip index's fastest 10,000-point climb, powered by strong quarterly results and rising bets of interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】
